Catagory.Title: Computer Science Major
Catagory.Explanation: Computer Science Major The general computer science major is flexible. It allows you to create a focus that reflects your interests and prepares you for a range of careers, such as programmer, systems analyst, database administrator, interaction designer, and network administrator.

Catagory.Title: Software Professional
Catagory.Explanation: Software Professional The software professional concentration provides you with the best preparation you can have for a career in software development. This stream requires you to take courses that have considerable programming components.
